title: AuthPro插件出现错误求教啊！
author: 呆榊
txt_content:
打开之后如下


09:57:37 [INFO] Starting plugins...
09:57:37 [ERROR] A E_NOTICE error happened: "Undefined property: ServerAPI::$file" in "E:\单机游戏\我的世界\PocketMine-MP\plugins\AuthPro.php" at line 45

Fatal error: Call to a member function SafeCreateFolder() on a non-object in E:\单机游戏\我的世界\PocketMine-MP\plugins\AuthPro.php on line 45
09:57:37 [SEVERE] An unrecovereable has ocurred and the server has crashed. Creating an error dump
09:57:37 [ERROR] A E_WARNING error happened: "Division by zero" in "E:\单机游戏\我的世界\PocketMine-MP\src\PocketMinecraftServer.php" at line 92
09:57:37 [SEVERE] Please submit the "Error_Dump_Thu_Mar_27-09.57.37-UTC_2014.log" file to the Bug Reporting page. Give as much info as you can.
09:57:37 [INFO] Stopping server...
bin\php\php.exe: Segmentation fault

replies.author: hsk001ufo
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 hsk001ufo 于 2014-3-28 19:50 编辑 

第一次用还是以前有使用过？如果是第一次的话还是推荐使用SimpleAuth这是下载地址http://forums.pocketmine.net/plugins/simpleauth.4/
可能是插件已过期，请参照2楼下载SimpleAuth替代或者上传一下 [size=]Error_Dump_Thu_Mar_27-09.57.37-UTC_2014.log 以方便分析更多细节
